page.title: 03AMBULANCE STATION,DONNINGTON
page.content: The ambulance station is situated on Wrekin Drive,by the Health Centre.It was built less than ten years ago and houses four vehicles.The ambulances take patients from north and central areas of Telford to hospitals in Wellington and Shrewsbury.Accident victims have to be taken to the Royal Shrewsbury Hospital 14 miles away. Building has recently begun on the much-needed Telford Hospital. The ambulances are manned by three shifts of drivers during each 24 hour period.The station is one of only 3 in in the Telford area, the others being at Wellington and Madeley.Between them they have to have at least one vehicle available at all times in case of an accident on the M54 motorway.If all ambulances are in use one has to be transferred from Shrewsbury on stand- by duty.
